about_the_game:
Included in this bundle:

Demon Slayer Class
Demonspawn Class

The Demon Slayer

The Demon Slayer, an entrepreneur with high morale and a commanding ego, brings spectacle wherever he goes. This brave lone wolf defies limits, mastering both ranged weapons and close-quarters combat with swords as he embraces his inner demons.

Playstyle:

The Demon Slayer allows players to become the harbinger of bullet hell with an array of ranged skills or confront their inner darkness as a melee fighter wielding shadow magic. Players who choose this class can tear enemies apart with a diverse skillset while maintaining tactical distance.

Recommended for:

  • Players who enjoy true ranged bullet-hell gameplay or engaging in sharp, precise melee combat.

  • Fans of physical damage builds.

  • If you couldn't resist the Demon Slayer's tempting advertisement for his services!

Hah, I'm just getting warmed up!

The Demonspawn

The Demonspawn brings true darkness to your fingertips, wielding a vile arsenal of arcane spells and gruesome skills, from tearing spines from enemies to channeling ancient blood magic. This prince of darkness revels in ripping, tearing, and destroying without remorse, savoring every moment.

Playstyle:

The Demonspawn is a long-range caster specializing in traditional spell-casting, ranging from sharp bones and bone fragments to blood bolts, blood demons, and a massive blood surge, all while keeping a safe distance from enemies.

Recommended for:

  • Players who prefer a safer playstyle by casting from afar.

  • Those who prioritize damage and utility over defensive stats and are willing to take risks to obliterate their foes.

  • Anyone eager to know what true power feels like.

Never think you can fully control a demon!
